name: Battle of the Tech Bands - Brisbane 2024
description: In its third year, Battle of the Tech Bands returned to The Triffid in Newstead for another night of tech industry talent colliding with rock and roll. Five bands from Brisbane's growing tech scene took the stage, each bringing their own flavour to the competition. Sponsored by Jumbo Interactive, the event continued to raise funds for Youngcare while cementing BOTTB's place as a beloved fixture in Brisbane's live music calendar. When the votes were counted, it was The Fuggles from FoundU who emerged victorious, capping off a memorable night with a well-earned win.
